pros: A sleek design that will protect your ankles with their stiff build
Reliable and durable, these are boots you'll want to buy again
Water-resistant full-grain leather uppers and Gore-Tex lining

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Paid alot of money for these boots and after only 6 months the sole has come apart. I'm a lineman and have always worn this brand boot, but bought at REI. First time buying them on Amazon. I know with REI I could return. Disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Yvette  Williams

customer_reviews.title: 8th pair of these..
customer_reviews.text: This is about my 8th pair of the asolo 520s. I wear these boots all day ..everyday in the construction industry. They are form fitting, the waterproof goretex is excellent, and the soles are slolid. You could stand on jagged pointy rocks and never know. I spend most of my days on my feet and I never think twice about this purchase to protect my posture and my feet. The photos depict a brand new pair replacing my previous pair worn everyday for 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Newday89

customer_reviews.title: I  am an Asoloaholic
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Asolo boots for so long that I can't remember the last brand of outdoor boot I wore before finding Asolos. My first Asolo boots were a pair of Snowpine backcountry/telemark boots. After the discomfort of my previous ski boots, I was so amazed at their immediate comfort that I changed over to Asolo for my hiking boots also. I can put a pair of Asolos on right out of the box and take off on a multi day trip never having to worry about breaking them in. They are the most comfortable boot I have ever worn and they fit my feet perfectly. What more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: OC nubi

customer_reviews.title: Great UPS boot. Best I’ve found yet.  Souls have not delaminated like other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these boots. Well made and thought out features. Have held up under tougher daily use than most boots do. Comfortable right out of the box but also a strong boot. Got lucky with the fit... ordered a size larger than normal due to availability and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado sun

customer_reviews.title: My job before retirement was teaching so I could wear a boot without criticism at work and did not look bad either. This boot pr
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair as i wear them all the time so I'm somewhat biased. My job before retirement was teaching so I could wear a boot without criticism at work and did not look bad either. This boot provides great side protection of my ankles so it is also my motorcycle boot, and I ride mostly on motorcycle. They can clean up well and I've worn to Church, wife not happy with the boot in church, but with old feet the boot does great. Being water resistant I can ride in the rain (not much rain in Texas right now) as I did in CO. and my feet never got wet.
customer_reviews.author: gboswellsac

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of these same boots. I have owned a variety of hiking boots -including several pairs of Vasque Sundowners- which were my favorite, until switching to Asolo. I was so loyal to Vasque (while flirting with other brands) for years before settling on Asolo. This is simply (in my estimation) the best boot out there for its intended purpose. My other two pairs are going to the shoe guy next week for their re-sole.
customer_reviews.author: JHo

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair in 14 years. By far the most comfortable boot I've ever owned and the most comfortable show I own. I've put a thousand plus miles on these boots over the years and the last fits my foot perfectly. Both the boots and the shoe laces wear extremely well. My only complaint is the shoe laces tend to hang up on that middle right side lace hook, or maybe I just need to bend over just a bit farther.
customer_reviews.author: Argus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these boots for years, and finally treated myself. They are well worth the money. They are true to size, and very high quality. I am very glad I bought them, and look forward to putting many more miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: nick cal

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot.
customer_reviews.text: From past experience I know that Asolo boots run a little small even in the wide version, or at least for my foot which is slightly wider than 2E, so I ordered up a half size (ordered 10W instead of 9.5W); and the fit is perfect for my foot, the length is the same as some of my other 9.5W boots, but I have more room in the toe box. I highly recommend this boot for anyone backpacking, hiking, or just as an everyday boot. I typically change out the insole to a Superfeet Green; then wear the boots for years.
customer_reviews.author: BAD

customer_reviews.title: I am a dyed in the wool chukar Hunter and needed a sturdy boot to handle the rugged rocky terrain I climb ...
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond elated with the purchase of these boots. I saved in excess of $100 buying these boots on Amazon versus REI. I am a dyed in the wool chukar Hunter and needed a sturdy boot to handle the rugged rocky terrain I climb up and down many times each year. These are the perfect sturdy boot for this type of terrain.
customer_reviews.author: B. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them on a week, but I know from experience with Asolo boots that these are worth the price...barely. $250+ is a buttload of money to spend on a pair of boots, but I know that I'll get at least 2 years of excellent wear out of these. I like the heavy, solid feel of tough leather and Vibrom soles. I'll wear these everyday in all matter of service: office, mud, snow, whatever. These look good and mean business. I'll have happyfeet no matter the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Do not by these boots off amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This would be my second pair of Asolo boots the first lasted a few years and stayed waterproof, after only Eleven months of on off use the cement holding the sole completely eroded away, one sole nearly came off. Asolo offers a two year warranty but only if you but from one of there certified Dealers and the third party buyer on here was not, so I’m out 320 on a set of boots. Live and learn Amazon as it’s perks but it can also screw you lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.  They run large and seller doesn't provide returns.  Try them on before buying here.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I've been hiking in them dozens of times and am amazed at how good my feet and ankles feel after a long day. I had to go a half-size down from what I typically wear and they still aren't snug. I'd recommend trying a pair on somewhere before buying on Amazon as the seller's return policy requires you to cover over $20 shipping out of your own pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these boots recently, so I don't have experience with how they wear. However, the "fit and finish" are excellent. They are very supportive around the ankle and Achilles, but not tight around the toe box. I'm very pleased with the boots performance so far. Comfortable from the day I put them on. While they are quite stiff boots, they don't feel like they need extensive breaking in before I could wear them on a day-long backpack.
customer_reviews.author: D. Longfellow

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to replace a 10 year old pair of the same boot
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fit I have found for hiking and field work. This most recent purchase handled four intense days in the desert of climbing over hills as I hunted for fossils. They gripped the steeply angled rock layers well. My previous pair was great for short backpacking trips and every day field use. I'm certain they will work for longer trips, but I haven't used them for a backpacking trip longer than 4 days (25 - 30 miles). I replaced the insole with Superfeet insoles as I had with my previous pair, but I waited to do so after I had broken in the boots.
customer_reviews.author: dracoverde

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price...you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Sweeeet pair of boots. So comfortable right out of the box. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Peti Tarrant

customer_reviews.title: Liked the all leather option however the fit was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked the all leather option however the fit was not right, ordered my usual size and had to return as they were too large. Since we could not get a smaller size we opted for a different design
customer_reviews.author: mhcal

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my second pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Asolo TPS 520. I wore the first pair every day for 3 years. This is the boot I will buy for the rest of my life I have wide feet, and have great trouble finding comfortable boots. These fit, provide tremendous support (I like my boots stiff), and are completely warm and waterproof Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.author: opus111

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: WELL BUILT I SOLD BOOTS AT REI, AND ASOLO IS THE BEST OF PRODUCTS, WELL MADE, LONG LASTING. I AM A MOUNTAINEER AND HAVE HAD PREVIOUS ASOLO BOOTS THAT LASTED YEARS OF EXTENSIVE HIKING I HAVE A NARROW WIDTH AND ASOLO FITS ME THE BEST
customer_reviews.author: stanley e brown

customer_reviews.title: Well made, decent durability
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing my old Vasque Sundowner boots that I have used for at least my last 4 pairs. The first thing I notice about these ASOLO's is they are more comfortable than my Vasque's. I have owned these ASOLO 520's for about 6 months now and use them as general purpose boots just like the Vasque. Both are great boots, I believe these are even better. Better durability wise and more comfortable. I also like the traction. The Vasque seem to be better in terms of waterproof qualities. Even when the Vasque are worn out they are waterproof... The ASOLO's are good for waterproof qualities, the Vasque are excellent. I now insist on goretex in my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Cool

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality boots. Ive had bad experiences with the past 3 paira of boots ive had for backpacking over the last 7 years. These boots have become my favorites since I started bacpacking at 18.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Hiking Boot!
customer_reviews.text: After using these for a long time I am very impressed with them and find the ankle support exceptional without binding movement or chaffing. Would buy again, but they are holding up so great it will be a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Picky Buyer

customer_reviews.title: 520 w in 11.5
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely happy with these boots . I see some others having sole issues honestly I can't see down the road but the fit and stability are top of the line .and also they aren't as heavy as I expected. I am extremely happy. Thanks Asolo And Amazon and a big nod to Moose Jaw for helping me out!
customer_reviews.author: Mike AAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent! perfection in a shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. excellent boot. The best I've ever worn in all my 60 years... out of the box comfort and great European quality. Fit my high instep in the 11 W which is my normal shoe size. I hesitated buying on line since I wondered how'd they fit and the returning factor etc. but no problem at all. These are expensive boots but I would still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D

customer_reviews.title: The best boots money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to replace a pair of Asolos that I had purchased six years ago. I still have the first pair, but they are getting a little worn by some severe Michigan winters, but even these old boots still have some life left. I have worn them into the swamps of Louisiana, the North Woods of Wisconsin, and the boulevards of Paris. I plan to take a little better care of the new pair and expect an to get even more wear from them.
customer_reviews.author: Historical Figure

customer_reviews.title: These boots felt great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These boots felt great right out of the box. I was a little apprehensive buying hiking boots online as you're never sure if they are going to fit correctly but I am happy to report that these fit just right. Had a lengthy hike today in the rain and no problems to report. Great boots and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SitkaChris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good boot for winter hiking, not good for paved surfaces
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Asols Mens Boots
customer_reviews.text: Asolo boots are the best ones I have every owned. This is my second set, and I will probably purchase them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sundog18

customer_reviews.title: JUST AS GOOD AS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I WORE THIS BRAND AND MODEL OF BOOTH 20 YEARS AGO TO HIKE THE APPALACIAN TRAIL. WELL NOT ALL OF IT BUT DID PUT ON HUNDREDS OF MILES AND HAD FAR FEWER FOOT PROBLEMS THAN MY BUDDIES. WELL HERE I AM NEEDING HIKING BOOTS SO I BOUGHT THESE GAIN. THEY ARE PERFECT. SECOND DAY I HAD THEM I WENT FOR A 11 MILE TREK IN THE NEW MEXICO MOUNTAINS. THEY WERE GREAT AND I DID NOT EVEN TAKE THE TIME TO BREAK THEM IN. THEY DON'T GET BETTER THAN THESE. I AM NOT A BELIVER IN THE ULTRA LITE CANVAS BOOT. THESE ARE FAR SUPERIOR FOR PROTECTING MY ANKLES AND FEET.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe Horses

customer_reviews.title: Great support, comfortable, bomb proof
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, dry, comfortable booth with fantastic support. Seem almost indestructible. These have replaced all others as my go-to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpacking boots!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hiking,backpacking boots that I have ever worn! They are heavy duty leather boots. I have completed several backpacking trips with these and comfort is excellent and my feet have never felt better. Even after very challenging terrain they are wearing very well. Be warned it will take some time to break these in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I pounded them down with a hammer and now all seems to be fine. However
customer_reviews.text: There were imperfections on the interior of the shoe which made it impossible to walk on at all. I pounded them down with a hammer and now all seems to be fine. However, I have only had them for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Somapro

customer_reviews.title: No better
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I was skeptical about dishing out this much money for boots. Boy was I surprised when I first put them on. I wear them every day even to work. I love these boots, I have planter faciitis and these boots keep me pretty much pain free.
customer_reviews.author: volstommy30

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots, Asolos are my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boots, Asolos are my favorite. Great quality, comfortable, durable. CampMor shipped extemely fast .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: found perfect boot, great job asolo and amazon!
customer_reviews.text: awesome!! found exactly what i was looking for and what was expected.,great look with matching quality
customer_reviews.author: Stayinfight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and my husband loves these boots - has been wearing them for years!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: best boots ever! spend the extra money these are well worth it, they are not cheap garbage I will never purchase any other brands again. show me a better hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Baum

customer_reviews.title: I really like these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. comfortable, excellent ankle support, which I really look for in a hiking boot. over all these are the best boots I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking boot. Sole is wonderful for trails but will not last long for casual wear on asphalt and concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel1776

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found and priced fairly
customer_reviews.text: A+++ boot. this is my second pair and I put a lot of miles on them. Best I have found and priced fairly.
customer_reviews.author: CAE-MI

customer_reviews.title: great boot. worth the cash.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and great feeling boot. A bit stiff at first but I can't wait til these bad Larry's are broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuy itall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of best hiking boot on the market, love the classic styling and excellent craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: oTIS

customer_reviews.title: Very great quality boots
customer_reviews.text: Very great quality boots, I replaced them with a pair which have lasted over 12 years and they seem just as durable so far. They did take a week to break in, and now they're perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I experienced minimal breakin with these boots. I have worn them on several overnight hikes and they are comfortable, warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cook

customer_reviews.title: Never let me down
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these boots for 10+ years with no problems. Just bought a second pair without reservation and they fit identically to my original pair - perfect. A high quality boot with a 40 year track record of excellence. I switched from Vasque Sundowners and never looked back (Vasques made in China - Asolo in Romania.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Racobs

customer_reviews.title: ... so I'm confident the size 9 wide will work great! Thanks for working with me as I get ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have tried them on somewhere first but nobody carries boots in Wides so I'm confident the size 9 wide will work great! Thanks for working with me as I get this order right! Thanks for your patience with me as I finally got the size that works best for me! These boots are great! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, a little on the heavy side but they don't leak and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: David Andrus

customer_reviews.title: style is sleek a bit over sized but in all one of the best.
customer_reviews.text: Very conformable and durable, style is sleek a bit over sized but in all one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: neworleans037

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these boots for years. I use them for a daily boot. I usually go through a set in 7 - 8 months. Break in is very easy and not painful.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best most stable and comfortable hiking boots I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... hike in them but fit and the appearance is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Have yet hike in them but fit and the appearance is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Petty

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pair of these for years. I've had them for around 3 weeks and love them. They fit perfect right out of the box and needed little to no break-in time.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot! Holds up for a very long time. I would love to give a 5 stars, but it is a tiny bit over priced. But cant find a boot that holds up like this one. Very happy with our boots.
customer_reviews.author: dspinz

customer_reviews.title: but the only better boots are the higher priced Asolos
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper boots..but the only better boots are the higher priced Asolos! Great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Boots! Have worn this type of Asolo boot for years and still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite hiking boots. although they may be a bit heavy for some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic boots, arrived quickly. I look forward to beating them up.
customer_reviews.author: KrisR

customer_reviews.title: needed something durable and waterproof for work
customer_reviews.text: 3 other people on my crew have these boots and have had them for over 4 years. they aren't the most comfortable boot I've owned but they keep my feet dry and I expect them to for next few years.
customer_reviews.author: michael h smith

customer_reviews.title: Been buying this brand for year and still love them. Not the coolest temperature boot
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this brand for year and still love them. Not the coolest temperature boot, but will keep you dry pretty long
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Sparks

customer_reviews.title: yep
customer_reviews.text: best boots ever owned and all I ever wear are boots .
customer_reviews.author: Bhima das

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, nicely finished, but run small
customer_reviews.text: I just received these from backcountry.com through Amazon.com yesterday (Friday, 11/11/2012). They are really beautiful, sturdy, well built, high quality backpacking boots. However, they run very small. I typically wear size 10.5 D(M) US sized shoes and boots. I ordered these in a US size 11 D(M), and they are still too small - more so in width than length. I have returned these for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gurgs

customer_reviews.title: Feel great
customer_reviews.text: Feels like they were broken in right outof the box
customer_reviews.author: James Owens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Stiff but comfortable, good support, good traction. Breaking in surprisingly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Brant Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend who had had a similar Asolo boots before. He is very pleased with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Historybuff

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Well made as you would expect from Asolo. Very supportive, nice lacing system stiff construction so they take some breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: OM45GE

customer_reviews.title: it takes me over 1000 days of non stop on ...
customer_reviews.text: it takes me over 1000 days of non stop on the go to were them out, 3rd per and counting
customer_reviews.author: David J Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Gift Item
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a Christmas gift. My son loves them. Tells me they are much better than competitors he has had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hively

customer_reviews.title: One of the best trekking boots.
customer_reviews.text: Stable, comfortable, waterproof, easy in which to stride, can carry a heavy pack. For me, I find the Lowa trekking boot offers more room in the box, is more stable, and is more comfortable. Every trekker has personal preferences. You have to try them on to know yours. Also, the Lowa nubuck doesn't scratch as easily as the Asolo leather (which is high quality). The Lowa does cost at least $70 more than the Asolo.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Luzwick

customer_reviews.title: Men's hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I purchased for my husband and he raves about that the fit is good and his feet stay warm
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable boots
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to get them broke in but when you do, you will have them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I've ever owned, this is my second pair
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am another victim of the Boot sole coming apart. This was after only 5 days of wearing them. I was hoping Asolo had taken care of this problem, but there are still some of these boots for sale out there. That being said these are the most comfortable and best fitting boots I have ever had. I liked them so much I plan to take my chances and get another pair after returning my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Long

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, I work out in the boot, ie. treadmill to break it in. I have also been hiking in them.
customer_reviews.author: dan hanson

customer_reviews.title: Asolo TPS 520 is Always my trusted standard.
customer_reviews.text: Asolo TPS 520 is Always my trusted standard. Shipped very fast
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Robb

customer_reviews.title: Great hikers!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for a lot of different hikes. Great fit right out of the box! So far they are what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell W. Pence

customer_reviews.title: unusual design inside of boot.
customer_reviews.text: Wearing booths for seventy years I have never purchased this boot before. After putting them and standing I noticed an unusual filling just past the heel area and forward along the outside of the boot in both feet. I could fill it hitting the bone inside both of my feet. Putting my hand inside to fell what it was there was a small step down just past the hell in the sole area. They were uncomfortable and I was not going to wear a boot with this unusual design. I sent them back ASAP. I don’t have a Romania’s foot, or they may have been defectively made. Now you know the truth.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, forgot how stiff they are.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to replace my previous pair of the same model. Those lasted 10 years and I had forgotten how stiff the leather is to start, but once they break in, they are great. Great ankle support, not too hot, good waterproofness.
customer_reviews.author: bordokcheez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing them now. What else am I wearing? That will cost you $.99 per minute.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Replacement after my husband's last pair finally bit it after 15 years. Great brand, great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Pace

customer_reviews.title: but must say they are the most comfortable pair of boots I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Asolo boots, and I have only worn them for less than a week know, but must say they are the most comfortable pair of boots I have ever owned. Curious to see how they hold up to the cold and wet winter here in CT.
customer_reviews.author: James Murzyn

customer_reviews.title: Well made, decent durability
customer_reviews.text: The Vasque seem to be better in terms of waterproof qualities. Even when the Vasque are worn out they are waterproof... The ASOLO's are good for waterproof qualities, the Vasque are excellent. I now insist on goretex in my boots.
customer_reviews.author: stonezhi

product_meta.title: Asolo Men's TPS 520 GV Evo Boot in Chestnut for Backpacking, Hiking, & Trekking
feature_bullets: Upper: Water resistant full grain leather 2,6-2,8 mm
Sole: Triple Power Structure Asolo/Vibram rubber-PU (dual-density)
